column3: “Great Strain!!! It really made me want to go outdoors and walk around the park and enjoy nature!”
“Gives you a clearheaded super high that makes you want to be active and get outside. Love it.”
“Great smoke, left me energetic, chatty and motivated”

“I probably should refrain from reviewing this strain until I try a larger sample but I was pretty impressed so I wanted to do a quick review.  I may come back later and update.  Another find from my guitar buddy.  We had set up a jam session and he gave me a choice of several strains and I grabbed this one.  Not an overpowering aroma but pleasant, with a slight fruit smell.  The draw was just a bit harsh but it could...”
“Got high. Listened to cuphead soundtrack. Proceeded to pay people on fiver to dance to cuphead for me. Money well spent 10/10 strain.”
“nice happy high. Made me very aroused.”
